context.p: The More Actions feature allows users to access the features within a meeting, roll over the bottom of the meeting window and click the three dots for settings.
Depending on if the participant joins as an authenticated user vs guest, the following options will display in the More Actions section.

ul.li:
Manage video quality
Allows the participant to change the range of video quality from Low bandwidth to High Definition depending on the quality of the connection.
Changing to low bandwidth will automatically disable all video streaming and focus on voice connections only.
Users can make changes to these settings at any time and this will only affect behavior on their meeting login.

Blur the background
Use this option when only when the camera is active.
This will give focus to the user in the meeting and blur the user surroundings.
This feature may affect video quality depending on background complexity.

View full screen
Users can expand the window of the meeting to the entire monitor screen.
Use the ESC button to return to normal screen size.

Share a YouTube video
This feature is only available for authenticated users.
When moderator settings permit, the user can click this option to share a video link and play directly in the meeting for other participants to watch. More information is available in the YouTube Integration section.

Copy meeting link
Click this option to capture the URL for the current meeting.

Settings
Users can make changes to the permissions of the camera and microphone associated with their Sametime Meetings.
The display will vary depending on the browser.
